plot: Sam is obsessed with global warming much to the annoyance of his long suffering family. He's built an Ark in his back garden and is proved right one dark stormy night.
title: Final Armageddon Dot Com
plot_es: Sam is obsessed with global warming much to the annoyance of his long suffering family. He's built an Ark in his back garden and is proved right one dark stormy night.
plot_en: Sam is obsessed with global warming much to the annoyance of his long suffering family. He's built an Ark in his back garden and is proved right one dark stormy night.
